attributes.action: crack down on drug crime among young men and teenagers in england and wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the west midlands drugs are a big issue not just hear but all over england and wales and teens do not seem to be taking the current laws against drug crime serious enough, its time for tougher laws to be brought in to deal with this huge problem and help prevent tomorrows teens frokm faling into the life style
